name: Notepad Dark UI - Windows 11
description:
This is how classic Notepad could look in Dark mode. I've also added Fluent design version.


Features:

  • Dark and Fluent UI
  • Status Bar
  • Notepad Icon
  • Redesigned components matched with current Windows 11 OS (build 21H2)


Credits:

Fonts and some Components - @microsoft


Like (or Tip) for more work !
